summary: This bill, H.R. 2216, aims to amend title 49 of the United States Code, specifically section 41731(c). It focuses on essential air service eligibility. The bill seeks to include Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands in the exception from certain requirements, similar to Alaska and Hawaii. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 18, 2025, by Mr. Moylan and Ms. King-Hinds and was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
